vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of an agreement with the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers (USACE) providing the amount of $2,000,000.00 for design assistance or potential implementation under Section 5140 of the Water Resources Development Act of 2007 (Public Law 110-114) for White Rock Lake Environmental Infrastructure Design Assistance for White Rock Lake totaling 75 percent of the agreement; (2) City of Dallas and the USACE to enter into a Project Partnership Agreement for the USACE to review environmental documents, water quality protection, dredging, permitting and design efforts, and for the City of Dallas to seek reimbursements for work performed; (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $2,000,000.00 in the USACE White Rock Lake EI Design Assistance Grant Fund; (4) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $2,000,000.00 in the USACE White Rock Lake EI Design Assistance Grant Fund; (5) City of Dallas to provide a matching share of 25 percent, in an amount not to exceed $666,666.67 from the Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund); and (6) execution of the agreement with USACE and all terms, conditions and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $2,666,666.67 - Financing: USACE White Rock Lake EI Design Assistance Grant Fund ($2,000,000.00) and Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($666,666.67)
